Name: Pukupuku
Notes: A fish enemy that swims on a set path if placed underwater or hops around a path if placed elsewhere. It can be defeated through all of the player's attacks, which causes it to drop a Coin or three Star Bits when defeated. It can be frozen by the second player's pointer.

Point_arg0.Name: Jump Type
Point_arg0.Description: How it jumps and moves on this point. Default is -1.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

Rail.Description: The path that it moves on.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

ScoreAttack.Description: This object scores 100 points in The Chimp's challenges.

Player2Targetable.Description: Can be targeted, frozen and defeated by player 2.

YoshiTargetable.Description: Can be targeted and eaten by Yoshi.

SearchTurtle.Description: Red Koopa Shells and Gold Shells home in on this object.
